CustomField.description: PSG Record Type formula, determine the record type based on the investment vehicle record type
CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.DeveloperName, 'Credit_Opportunities', '01233000000QNoy', '01240000000MHII' ) /* If credit, map to credit opp record type, otherwise default to the psg record type */
CustomField.label: PSG Opportunity Record Type
